name: research-cli
description: Deep Research extension using Gemini v1alpha Interactions API

settings.name: Research Model
settings.description: The Gemini model ID to use for deep research (default: deep-research-pro-preview-12-2025)

settings.name: Think Model
settings.description: The Gemini model ID to use for deep think (default: gemini-2.0-flash-thinking-exp)
